src:
To je mesto, kjer bi se ljubilo največ moških
V moških očeh ima seks pod prho prav poseben čar.
02 Nov 2019, 19:13 by M. F.
Kje bi moški najraje seksali? Če sklepamo po eni od na to temo izvedenih anket, v kateri je sodelovalo tisoč pripadnikov močnejšega spola, je postelja definitivno na zadnjem mestu. Kaj pa je na prvem? Prha. To je v svojem odgovoru navedlo kar 62 odstotkov sodelujočih.Med tistimi, ki so seks pod prho že okusili, je odstotek celo višji. Kar 81 odstotkov vprašanih bi dejanje z veseljem ponovilo.In kateri je za tak podvig najprimernejši letni čas? 56 odstotkov vprašanih meni, da poletje. To dejanje namreč ni le malo poredno in drugačno, ampak prinaša tudi svojevrstno osvežitev. Čeprav se mu večina ne bi odrekla ne glede na to, ali je zunaj vroče ali mraz.
text:
This is the place where most men would love
In men's eyes, having sex under the shower has a very special charm.
02 Nov 2019, 19:13 by M.F.
Where would men like to have sex? According to one of the polls conducted on this topic, in which thousands of members of the stronger sex participated, the bed is definitely in last place. What about first? Shower. According to 62 percent of those who participated in the response, the percentage is even higher among those who have already tasted sex in the shower. As many as 81 percent of respondents would be happy to repeat the action. And what is the best time of year for such a venture? 56 percent said summer. Not only is this act a little naughty and different, it also brings a kind of refreshment. Although most would not give up on him whether it is hot or cold outside.
